invitationArn.description: The ARN of the resource share invitation.

receiverAccountId.description: The account ID of the receiver account which accepts the invitation.

resources.description: A list of the resource ARNs shared via the resource share.

senderAccountId.description: The account ID of the sender account which submits the invitation.

shareArn.description: The ARN of the resource share.

shareId.description: The ID of the resource share as displayed in the console.

shareName.description: The name of the resource share.

status.description: The status of the resource share (ACTIVE, PENDING, FAILED, DELETING, DELETED).

shareArn.description: The ARN of the resource share.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering ResourceShareAccepter resources.
